product_name: The North Face Horizon Cargo Pants - Men's 32" Inseam
long_description: Planning a tropical vacation or a backpacking trip this summer? If the answer is yes, you'll want to set your sights on the Horizon Cargo pants from The North Face. Lightweight nylon ripstop fabric is ideal for warm-weather hiking and travel to tropical environments. With a UPF 50+ rating, fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Fabric is treated with a Durable Water Repellent finish to repel moisture and stains. Large zippered cargo pockets provide ample space for trail and travel essentials; front hand pockets and rear rip-and-stick pockets provide additional storage. Gusseted crotch allows unrestricted range of motion. The North Face Horizon Cargo pants have a relaxed fit.
short_description: Planning a tropical vacation or a backpacking trip this summer? If the answer is yes, you'll want to set your sights on the Horizon Cargo pants from The North Face.
